articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects State Academy of Sciences
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the State Academy of Sciences.
					 The Supreme Leader accompanied by officials made a bow before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the academy.
					
					 He went round the newly remodeled revolutionary museum there.
					
					 Watching with keen interest the valuable historic data and relics, he said that the academy which was founded in Dec. 1952 on the initiative of Kim Il Sung could advance along the road of glorious development under the care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He underscored the need to do well the ideological education through the revolutionary museum, so as to let all scientists bear in mind the unshakable faith that science knows no frontiers but they have the base of science and the precious socialist country which they should serve with science and that they will engage themselves in science only under the red flag of the Workers' Party of Korea and thus make them glorify eternally the noble ideas of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with great successes in scientific researches.
					
					 He looked round the Exhibition of Scientific Research Successes.
					
					 He said that the exhibition was remodeled well and a great deal of scientific research achievements and exhibits are on display, adding that fruits of our scientists' brains are very great and this place is a treasure house of self-reliance and self-development and the academy is the birthplace of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 Though they are hard pressed for everything under the difficult conditions, our scientists do a great work in the struggle for developing national economy and improving the people's standard of living, he said. He sent his warm greetings to all the scientists and technicians across the country, and bestowed great favors on the academy with special bonus.
					
					 He said the one of the secrets that the Korean revolution could make a long drive despite stern ordeals and difficulties and the strategic position of our Republic could be strengthened considerably was that we have staked the sovereignty and prestige of the country and nation and destiny of socialism on science and technology and directed primary efforts to the development of science and technology, adding that thanks to the foundation of self-supporting national economy, scientific and technical forces trained with our own efforts and their clear heads, there are no difficulties insurmountable for us despite the enemies' sanctions of 10 years or for 100 years.
					
					 We should channel big efforts into the work with talents of science and technology, respect them, solve in good time knotty problems so that they may not feel inconvenience in their researches and life and, at the same time, continue to increase investment in scientific researches, he said. He discussed the measures to more wonderfully build the academy and Wisong Scientists Residential District.
					
					 He expressed expectations and belief that the officials and scientists of the academy would make a tangible contribution to building a prosperous and powerful country with scientific research successes before having a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were Pak Thae Song, vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Choe Tong Myong, department director of the C.C., WPK, and Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Mali
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Mali
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, minister of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Tieman Hubert Coulibal on his appointment as minister of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of the Republic of Mali.
					 Expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would continue to strengthen, the message wished him success in his responsible work for the development of external relations of the country.

articles.title: Mongolian President Wishes Korean People Bigger Successes
articles.content:
Mongolian President Wishes Korean People Bigger Successes
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- O Sung Ho, DPRK ambassador to Mongolia, on Jan. 8 presented his credentials to Khaltmaa Battulga, president of Mongolia.
					 The president said that he wished the Korean people bigger successes under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader HE Kim Jong Un this year.
					
					 Referring to the long-standing traditional ties of friendship between the two countries, he said he would pay special attention to successfully holding the events marking the 70th anniversary of the establishment of bilateral diplomatic relations.

articles.title: Preparations for Farming Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for Farming Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The agricultural field, a major thrust in the building of an economic giant in the DPRK is seething with the efforts for implementing the task of the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The plain areas in the west coast are securing raw materials of huminite and pushing ahead with the production of various substitute fertilizers.
					
					 Anak, Paechon and Sinchon counties are producing hundreds of tons of humus soil every day.
					
					Jaeryong County, in particular, is carrying humus soil to the paddy and non-paddy fields by mobilizing hundreds of tractors and other vehicles.
					
					 High-yield counties in the Yonbaek Plain have waged a campaign to make and use the efficient fermentation composts.
					
					 Rural areas in the east coast are conducting an unprecedented emulation.
					
					 Hoeryong City secured humus soil for seed bed by twice than scheduled and Kilju, Hamju and Hongwon counties are stepping up preparations for farming.
					
					 Ryongchon, Yomju and Unjon counties are carrying thousands of tons of composts every day.
					
					 Jungsan County is carrying out the plan of spreading fertile soil on fields 1.5 times more than last year's.

articles.title: Kim Hyong Gwon's Patriotic Life
articles.content:
Kim Hyong Gwon's Patriotic Life
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyong Gwon, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, devoted his heroic life to the struggle for freedom and liberation of the Korean people.
					 In August Juche 19 (1930), he led one of the groups of the Korean Revolutionary Army organized by President Kim Il Sung to advance into the homeland and aroused broad people to the sacred war against the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 His group's dauntless military and political activities greatly astonished the enemy.
					
					 He was arrested by the Japanese police due to a renegade. The Japanese ruffians made every vicious attempt like mediaeval torture and threat and blackmail in a bid to bring him to his knees.
					
					 In an attempt to stay his influence in prison they locked him up in a dark isolation cell and put irons on his wrists and ankles so that the irons cut into his flesh whenever he made the slightest movement. But he did not stop his struggle in such harsh conditions.
					
					 He inspired the prisoners with confidence in victory, saying at the last moment of his life as follows:
					
					 "Kim Il Sung is my nephew. He is now leading a large revolutionary force in Manchuria, thrashing the Japanese swine. It will not be long before his army storms into the country. Wait in arms to greet them. Only when we fight can we expel the Japanese ruffians and liberate the country!"
					
					 On January 12, 1936 his heart stopped beating in a frosted cell.
					
					 Kim Il Sung in his reminiscences "With the Century" said:
					
					 If there was anything my uncle feared more than death, it must have been the betrayal of the faith which makes a man righteous and courageous and enables him to be the most dignified being in the world.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Un as Bright Lodestar of National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Jong Un as Bright Lodestar of National Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The cause of Korea's independent reunification is sure to be accomplished despite the persistent challenges and obstructive moves of the separatist forces as the Koreans have respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un as the sun of the nation and the bright lodestar of national reunification, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Friday.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 It is the noble patriotic will of the father of the nation to decisively end the confrontation era woven with distrust and antagonism and usher in a new era of national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 It is time that the north and the south of Korea sit face to face with a view to holding sincere discussions over the issue of improving inter-Korean relations by our nation itself and seek a way out for its settlement in a bold manner. The north and the south should remove mutual misunderstanding and distrust, open a broad avenue of improving relations through reconciliation and cooperation and thus fulfill their responsibility and role as the motive force of national reunification.
					
					 To defuse the grave military tension and create a peaceful environment on the Korean Peninsula is the primary task for improving the north-south relations at the lowest ebb, saving the nation's destiny from crisis and ushering in a new era of national reunification.
					
					 The recent inter-Korean high-level talks are a precious fruition of the new policy set forth by the respected Supreme Leader in his New Year Address to improve the north-south relations.
					
					 He is a peerless patriot and the supreme incarnation of love and benevolence as he is creditably carrying forward the patriotic history with the same warm love for the nation and benevolence as those of the great leaders.
					
					 A new dawn of national reunification is breaking thanks to his warm patriotic will and under his extraordinary leadership.

articles.title: Candlelight Rally against THAAD in S. Korea
articles.content:
Candlelight Rally against THAAD in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- A candlelight rally was reportedly held in Kimchon City, North Kyongsang Province on Jan. 7 to declare a struggle for the withdrawal of illegally-deployed THAAD.
					 Taking part in it were members of civic and trade unions and inhabitants in Kimchon City and Songju County.
					
					 Speakers at the rally called for a concerted action to have THAAD withdrawn this year without fail.
					
					 A resolution, read out there, stressed that the action for withdrawal of THAAD is a struggle for independence and life and for peace in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Punishment of Hirelings of Traitor Park Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Punishment of Hirelings of Traitor Park Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The South Kyongsang Provincial Movement Headquarters for Eradicating the Deep-rooted Evils and Building Democratic Society called a press conference on Jan. 8 over the case in which an exhibit was displayed to praise "yusin" dictator Park Chung-Hee and traitor Park Geun Hye.
					 The organization demanded an investigation into the case and the punishment of those responsible for it, according to the south Korean online paper OhmyNews.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced in Venezuela
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Venezuelan National Society for the Study of the Juche Idea on January 2 carried the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address in its bulletin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- In the period between December 18 and 24 last year, media of different countries gave special write-ups to the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 They carried a photo of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Suk, a woman commander of Mt Paektu, standing together and photos and art works depicting her.
					
					 The Iranian Ilna and the Nepalese online magazine Nepal Today said that the exploits of Kim Jong Suk, a prominent woman revolutionary produced by the Korean nation, would remain forever with the victorious advance of Juche Korea, reporting in detail about her transparent spirit of devotedly protecting the leader, rare military strategy, incredible marksmanship, matchless pluck and warm humanity.
					
					 The Congolese newspaper Le Patriot wrote that there have been many prominent women in history but no such distinguished woman political activist as Kim Jong Suk who devoted her all to the freedom and happiness of the people.
					
					 Her noble career left unforgettable mark in the modern history of Korea, it added.
					
					 The newspaper Zavtra, DV-Ros News Service and other media of Russia introduced her revolutionary career and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Backed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Backed Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Personages of Cyprus and Uganda on Jan. 2 and 3 made public statements in support of the New Year Address delivered by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Adamos Katsantonis, chairman of the Cyprus-DPRK Cultural Friendship Association, said that Kim Jong Un set forth tasks for vigorously advancing socialism in his New Year Address, adding:
					
					 Entirely just are the ways for the economic development in the DPRK and global peace and security, indicated by him.
					
					 I offer warm wishes to Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un devotedly working for the country's prosperity and the global peace.
					
					 Daniel Rugarama, chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement, said that last year the DPRK achieved gigantic development despite the U.S. unprecedented sanctions and thus gave full play to its prestige before the world eyes.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un's New Year Address clearly indicates the orientation and ways for the Korean people's struggle for this year and reflects the future of the strategic state.
					
					 The New Year Address overflowing with compatriotic feelings is run through with positive contents for the sake of Korea's reunification.
					
					 The U.S. must roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK in keeping with the wishes of humankind for peace and justice.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Is of Great Significance: Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Is of Great Significance: Swiss Bodies
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- Comrade Kim Jong Un's New Year Address is of weighty significance as it indicates the effective ways for accomplishing the cause of building a powerful socialist country and achieving the national reunification at an early date true to the behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea said this in a joint statement on Jan. 1 in support of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					
					 The statement said that as Kim Jong Un clarified in his New Year Address, the year 2017 of the DPRK was a year of heroic struggle and great victory, a year when the DPRK set up an indestructible milestone in the history of building a powerful socialist country with the spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force, adding:
					
					 An outstanding success the Party, state and people of the DPRK won last year was the accomplishment of the great, historic cause of perfecting the national nuclear forces.
					
					 This year will mark the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un set forth in his New Year Address the slogan "Let us launch a revolutionary general offensive to achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country!"
					
					 He clarified that as a responsible, peace-loving nuclear power, the DPRK will neither have recourse to nuclear weapons unless hostile forces of aggression violate its sovereignty and interests nor threaten any other country or region by means of nuclear weapons.
					
					 We hope that a rosy future would be promised for the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced in Brazil
 Pyongyang, January 12 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea posted the full text of President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Overthrow Imperialism" on its website on January 5.
					 The work, published on October 17, Juche 15 (1926), clarifies the idea that it is necessary to fight to the last against the Japanese imperialists to free the popular masses from colonial slavery.
					
					 It also sets forth tasks to overthrow the Japanese imperialists and achieve the independence of Korea so as to make sure that the Korean people lead a free and happy life and creditably carry out the sacred cause of overthrowing all imperialism on the earth to make the oppressed working people of the whole world lead a free and happy life.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Academia Estatal de Ciencias
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la Academia Estatal de Ciencias
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un realizo la visita de orientacion sobre la Academia Estatal de Ciencias.
					Junto con los funcionarios acompanantes, el rindio homenaje al Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de bronce levantadas en la academia.
					
					Ante todo, recorrio el recien remodelado museo de la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Viendo atentamente los valiosos datos y objetos conservados ahi, dijo que desde que fuera fundada en diciembre de 1952 por la iniciativa personal del Presidente Kim Il Sung, la academia pudo recorrer un orgulloso trayecto de desarrollo gracias a la direccion de los grandes Lideres.
					
					  Al organizar bien la educacion ideologica a traves de este museo reconstruido magnificamente, hay que infundir en todos los cientificos la conviccion de que aunque la ciencia no tiene fronteras, ellos tienen el terreno de ciencia y la preciosa patria socialista a que deben servir con ella y han de dedicarse a la investigacion cientifica solo bajo la bandera roja del PTC, instruyo.
					
					De esa manera, ellos deben materializar el noble proposito  del Presidente y el Dirigente con notables exitos de investigacion cientifica, recalco.
					
					  Acto seguido, Kim Jong Un recorrio la exposicion de ciencias.
					
					  Senalando que en esta exposicion bien acondicionada se exhiben muchos datos de logros de investigacion cientifica y son magnificas las creaciones del cerebro de nuestros cientificos, evaluo que este lugar es el tesorero de los productos del espiritu de autofortalecimiento y la academia es la casa natal del mismo.
					
					  A pesar de la escasez de lo todo y las condiciones dificiles, nuestros cientificos desempenan papel importante en la lucha por desarrollar la economia nacional y mejorar las condiciones de la vida del pueblo, elogio.
					
					Transmitio su cordial agradecimiento a todos los cientificos y tecnicos del pais y dio el premio especial en efectivo a la academia.
					
					  La revolucion coreana avanza victoriosamente superando con valentia todas las pruebas y dificultades y la posicion estrategica de la RPDC se ha elevado extraordinariamente, dijo y continuo que una de sus claves esta en dar prioridad al desarrollo de ciencias y tecnicas confiando en ellas la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la nacion y el destino del socialismo.
					
					Aunque nos sancionen 10 o 100 anos los enemigos, no tenemos ninguna dificultad insuperable porque contamos con el competente personal cientifico-tecnico que hemos formado y con sus cerebros inteligentes, afirmo.
					
					  Hay que prestar profunda atencion a la labor con los cientificos y tecnicos talentosos, respetarlos, revolver a tiempo los problemas surgidos en su trabajo y vida y seguir incrementando la inversion en la investigacion cientifica, indico y discutio los remedios para acondicionar mejor la Academia Estatal de Ciencias y el reparto de viviendas de cientificos Wisong.
					
					  Se retrato con los funcionarios y cientificos de la academia expresando la esperanza y conviccion de que ellos haran mucho aporte a la construccion de una patria prospera con los exitos de investigacion cientifica.
					
					  Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Pak Thae Song, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Choe Tong Myong, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Khaltmaa Battulga desea al pueblo coreano mayores exitos en el Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Khaltmaa Battulga desea al pueblo coreano mayores exitos en el Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 12 de enero (ACNC) -- El embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario coreano O Sung Ho entrego el dia 8 sus cartas credenciales al presidente de Mongolia, Khaltmaa Battulga. 
					En la ocasion, el mandatario deseo que en el Ano Nuevo, el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos bajo la guia de Su Excelencia Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Mongolia y Corea mantienen durante largo tiempo las tradicionales relaciones de amistad, dijo y expreso la voluntad de prestar atencion especial para que se celebren excelentemente los actos dedicados al 70o aniversario del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas entre los dos paises.
